title: Misaligned icons next to URL bar
content:
Graphical explanation here. Basically, the icons on the side of the URL bar are misaligned. Prior to the latest update to version 112.02 (installed via Pacman), the icons were not visible, yet the buttons worked as intended.

I'm suspecting that there's an issue with the GTK icon theme (see attachment for system settings), but I'm not sure how I can resolve it.
creator: michaelgauci.mt

title: Stop news notifications on browser start
content: Whenever I open Firefox on my Windows 11 laptop, a notification panel appears bottom right highlighting a news article from cordbusters.co.uk. I don't remember subscribing to this service and I can't turn it off. I can ignore it, and it times out after a few seconds. I checked addons and extensions but searching for 'cordbuster' in Settings gives no results. Running an internet search for cordbuster gives results for other sites quoting cordbuster but nothing suggesting a service provision. I am a long-term user of Firefox on phone and laptop.
creator: Rich57

title: Audio problems
content: I have no audio on firefox. I have audio in other programs but not firefox. I have tried different websites, and yes I did double check to make sure the website was not muted, and still nothing. I have cleared the cookies, and history. I have restarted firefox. The recommenced performance settings, which in my search for answers says should be turned off if you don't have audio in firefox, is already turned off. I had this problem before and forget how I solved it but it seems firefox just seems to randomly shut off the sound.
creator: dreamneophyte

title: Firefox background apps 23-30
content: Firefox is running 23-30 apps in the background and consuming about 30% of CPU simply when it is open. Is this legit or is something else going on? Reduce number of apps running in the background so that less CPU bandwidth is utilized.

title: Can't access Spotify website.
content:
For some reason I can't access the Spotify website (spotify.com or https://open.spotify.com/). I get this error message:

Page not found - We can’t seem to find the page you are looking for. Any ideas? This is infuriating. I'm on a Mac running Ventura and the newest version of Firefox. Thanks.
creator: virtualscottx

title: Becoming a certificate authority
content:
Greetings,

Due to predatory business practices, I have resorted to launching a basic webhosting business to support my other businesses and provide cost effective online presence solutions to small businesses. In order to provide the best service, I'll need to become a certification authority. I am well aware of how to generate AES256 encrypted key pairs (4096), and I will have no trouble following the rules listed in section 2 here:

https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/about/governance/policies/security-group/certs/policy/#2-certificate-authorities

Who might I contact to further my goals? You will notice that my sites lack SSL encryption at the moment, because I would prefer to issue them myself. When I self-sign them currently, browsers do not honor my certificates. For some background, here is my linkedin:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/johnepetersen

Along with my professional resume:

http://n-dtech.com/contact/jpetersenResumeMay2023.pdf
creator: ceo@goodcheapsites.com

title: Opening links in new tab from pinned tab switches to them
content: Whenever I open a link in a new tab from a pinned tab (using ctl-click "open in new tab" or cmd+clicking) it switches to that tab, even with "switch to new tab immediately" disabled. I would like it to just open the new tab and not switch to it, but I can't find any option in the settings or about:config that would change it. Is there any way to do this?
creator: pieaholicx

title: Installing Last Pass Add-on
content:
Hello, With the latest Firefox update I lost the LastPass add-on, and Firefox will not let me install in again. I get the message "LastPass: Free Password Manager could not be installed because Firefox cannot modify the needed file." Can you help me with this please?

Thank you, Colleen
creator: colleenhh
